list.name: Deployment Scale Events
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  extract(epoch from time_column) AS time,
  text_column as text,
  tags_column as tags
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

list.name: Deployments
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  extract(epoch from time_column) AS time,
  text_column as text,
  tags_column as tags
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

list.name: Container Errors
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  extract(epoch from time_column) AS time,
  text_column as text,

FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

description: Example of Groundcover's PromQL Datasource Powers

targets.expr: topk(20, avg(groundcover_resource_latency_seconds{type=~"postgresql|mysql", namespace='$namespace', workload_name='$workload', role="client", quantile="0.50"}) by (remote_service_name))
topk(10, avg (groundcover_resource_latency_seconds{type=~"postgresql|mysql", namespace='$namespace', workload_name='$workload', role="client", quantile="0.50"}) by (query_id))

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  r.attributes->>'db.operation' as query_id,
  r.attributes->>'query_fingerprint' as query_fingerprint
FROM _ps_trace.resource as r
JOIN _ps_trace.span_entities s
  ON r.hash_id = s.resource_hash
WHERE (s.product_type = 'postgresql' OR s.product_type = 'mysql')
  AND s.name LIKE '$workload'
  AND s.namespace LIKE '$namespace'
group by 1,2

SELECT
  r.attributes->>'db.operation' as query_id,
  r.attributes->>'query_fingerprint' as query_fingerprint
FROM _ps_trace.resource as r
JOIN _ps_trace.span_entities s
  ON r.hash_id = s.resource_hash
WHERE (s.product_type = 'postgresql' OR s.product_type = 'mysql')
  AND s.name LIKE '$workload'
  AND s.namespace LIKE '$namespace'
group by 1,2

targets.expr: topk(20, avg by (remote_addr) (groundcover_resource_latency_seconds{type="dns", namespace='$namespace', workload_name='$workload', role="client", quantile="0.50"}))

title: Workload Overview Dashboard
